GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, default order is descending by date

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns all data regarding a specific article id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: accepts a body of "{inc_votes: Number}" which updates the vote count of the specific article

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments relating to the given article id, ordered by the most recent first

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts a new comment on the given article

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of user objects

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.desciption: deletes the comment with the specified id

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: accepts a body of "{inc_votes: Number}" which updates the vote count of the specific article
